short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BrandBay: Simplified brand asset management, organization, and collaboration. Quick access to colors, links, logos, media, and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
--- Official BrandBay.io Browser Extension ---

BrandBay helps digital marketers and agencies organize, collaborate on, and distribute brand assets such as:

- Logos
- Fonts
- Color codes
- Images
- Videos
- Files
- and more...

BrandBay keeps these assets organized into collections with advanced searching to give you instant access to your brand assets. Organize, collaborate on, and distribute each of your logos, fonts, colors, images, videos, documents, and more.

ABOUT BRANDBAY

BrandBay - Where your brand assets live. No matter how many brands you manage.
Store and organize multiple brand identities in one, clean place so you have each of that brand’s core assets at your fingertips easily accessible right when you need them. And with BrandBay’s browser extension and desktop applications, your assets are no more than a few clicks away.

Invite your clients to view and/or collaborate on their brand giving them quick and easy access to each of their assets, the moment you or your team uploads them. With each brand established in BrandBay you can invite team members at various levels of permissions to collaborate with, giving digital agencies and even large teams a simple source of access to frequently used brand assets and media.

Once your assets are organized for your team and clients, BrandBay enables you to securely distribute your assets in a number of flexible ways. Embed your media on your website, share on social, and distribute secure share links for individual files, collections of assets, and entire brand libraries - with optional password protection for your sensitive data.

Create a free account today at https://www.brandbay.io/.
